channel.title: How to make a ::funpk without losing items?
channel.description:
How do you make a funpk. I know how to make the command with the coords and stuff but how do you make a random place a multi pvp zone, and when you die there you don't lose anything?
Also if anybody knows can someone help me make varrock bank a pvp zone? Because the source I have has a different spot pvp zone, but when I change the ::pvp command to varrock bank coords it's not a pvp zone? Thanks for helping =)

item.title: How to make a ::funpk without losing items?
item.dc:creator: @wanbliscape wanbliscape
item.description:
@wanbliscape wrote:

I don’t even know what delta means, its a 517 source that is from z508, which is espeon or something like that? but that’s all I can say

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a ::funpk without losing items?
